Class DateUtils

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for performing common operations on dates

    1.00
    Author:
    jmrunge

      • crossedDates

        public static boolean crossedDates(java.util.Date from1,
                   java.util.Date to1,
                   java.util.Date from2,
                   java.util.Date to2)
        Method to check if two specified date ranges (from1-to1 and from2-to2) are overlaped in time. If to1 or to2 should be Null, a maximum Date of (2099/12/31 23:59:59) will be assigned for comparissions to work (assumed as ongoing range)
        Parameters:
        from1 - start date of range 1
        to1 - end date of range 1 (may be null)
        from2 - start date of range 2
        to2 - end date of range 2 (may be null)
        Returns:
        true if ranges overlap or the ranges are malformed or ranges have same start or end, false otherwise
        See Also:
        Date

      • getMaximumDate

        public static java.util.Date getMaximumDate()
        Method that returns an insane max date to be used in comparissions where nulls cant be accepted
        Returns:
        a Date representing 2099/12/31 23:59:59

      • getToDate

        public static java.util.Date getToDate(java.util.Date fromDate)
        Method that returns the lastHourOfDay value for the day before to fromDate
        Parameters:
        fromDate - the date to use as basis
        Returns:
        the lastHourOfDay of the day before fromDate
        See Also:
        lastHourOfDay(java.util.Date)

        Parameters:
